item.title: bbwin - xymon/hobbitmon windows client installation
item.description: BBwin installation Install bbwin client to machine Edit c:program filesBBWinetcBBWin.cfg telling it the server is “10.10.10.10” (will be under a setting called bbdisplay) edit the bbwin registry to make it use the FQDN and not the server name. Change the hostname entry from “%COMPUTERNAME%” to “%COMPUTERNAME%.%USERDNSDOMAIN%” minus the quotes 64bit Machines = “HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINESOFTWAREWow6432NodeBBWin”. 32bit Machines = “HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINESOFTWAREBBWin” With 64bit Windows you need to add an extra setting in bbwin.
